comprehensive_overview: Jupyter Notebook is an open-source web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations, and explanatory text. These documents are executable and can support various programming languages.
core_features: Supports interactive data visualization, offers support for over 40 programming languages, integrates easily with data science and machine learning libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn, provides a collaborative environment for data analysis and research projects, facilitates the creation of interactive presentations, enables the creation of reproducible research workflows.
